name: Brown Sugar Chicken
ingredients: 1 Cup brown sugar 2 T. Soy sauce
2 T. ketchup 4 Boneless, skinless Chicken breast
steps: In a skillet combine butter, brown sugar, ketchup, mustard and soy sauce. Bring to a boil then set aside.
Place chicken in a baking dish and pour mixture over it. Cover and cook for 1 hour at 350 degrees.
Serve over rice. This dish is super easy and the kids love it!
